thread.title: U.S. hits Venezuelan vice president with 'kingpin act' sanctions
thread.title_full: U.S. hits Venezuelan vice president with 'kingpin act' sanctions

author: USA TODAY
title: U.S. hits Venezuelan vice president with 'kingpin act' sanctions
text:
U.S. hits Venezuelan vice president with 'kingpin act' sanctions The Trump administration imposed sanctions Monday against Venezuelan Vice President Tareck El Aissami, accusing him of playing a major role in international drug trafficking, according to the Treasury Department. Post to Facebook U.S. hits Venezuelan vice president with 'kingpin act' sanctions The Trump administration imposed sanctions Monday against Venezuelan Vice President Tareck El Aissami, accusing him of playing a major role in international drug trafficking, according to the Treasury Department.  //usat.ly/2l93NOh   Join the Nation's Conversation   U.S. hits Venezuelan vice president with 'kingpin act' sanctions USA TODAY Published 5:48 p.m. ET Feb. 13, 2017 | Updated 3 minutes ago CONNECT COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
The Trump administration imposed sanctions Monday against Venezuelan Vice President Tareck El Aissami, accusing him of playing a major role in international drug trafficking, according to the Treasury Department.
